name: QuestEvent
description:
QuestEvent is a Adventure RPG. You will have a world to explore, practice different Skills and doing Quests.
The graphics of the game are Pokémon likely. But the Content is based on several huge MMORPG's.

The game has the following features:
  • 2D Game environment
  • Content from huge MMORPG's
  • No Subscription. Pay once and play!
  • 4 different skills to train: Woodcutting, Fishing, Firemaking & Dungeoneering
  • Several Quests spread over the whole World.
  • Music and SoundEffects.
  • And much more to come...

Please check our other GreenLight Concept HERE
